it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a player and contains all the necessary flags to handle the phases of the match (initial phase, first turn, playing phase) and the actions of the turn (die placement, use of a tool card). Contains the window of the player, which contains the number of tokens still available to the player.
